      • canReschedule

        public static java.lang.Boolean canReschedule​(java.lang.Integer jobId,
                                              JobStatus jobStatus,
                                              JobFrequency jobFrequency,
                                              java.util.Date activationDate,
                                              java.util.Date startDate)
                                       throws InvalidJobStatusException
        Determines if a job can be rescheduled. Active and cancelled one-time jobs (1T, CC, IC, OC) can be rescheduled. A job has to have been activated at some point to be able to reschedule
        Parameters:

        jobStatus -
        jobFrequency -
        activationDate -
        startDate -

        startDate - Date from which job is to be scheduled

      • makeTagSql

        public static java.lang.String makeTagSql​(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                          java.lang.String innerTableName)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a subselect to be included in a sql query that returns the abbreviation for each tag that a job contains. This select will generally be joined to a more wide-ranging select, like a job query for lookup or report For example: select job_id, concat(my_tags.WFP,my_tags.LPT,my_tags.GSS,my_tags.PWS) as tag_list from ( select job_tag_xref.job_id, case when count(WFP.tag_id) > 0 then 'WFP ' else '' end as WFP, case when count(LPT.tag_id) > 0 then 'LPT ' else '' end as LPT, case when count(GSS.tag_id) > 0 then 'GSS ' else '' end as GSS, case when count(PWS.tag_id) > 0 then 'PWS ' else '' end as PWS from job_tag_xref left outer join job_tag as WFP on WFP.tag_id=job_tag_xref.tag_id and WFP.abbrev='WFP' left outer join job_tag as LPT on LPT.tag_id=job_tag_xref.tag_id and LPT.abbrev='LPT' left outer join job_tag as GSS on GSS.tag_id=job_tag_xref.tag_id and GSS.abbrev='GSS' left outer join job_tag as PWS on PWS.tag_id=job_tag_xref.tag_id and PWS.abbrev='PWS' group by job_tag_xref.job_id) as my_tags
        Parameters:
        conn -
        innerTableName -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
